channel.title: Luls neopets hax Luls
channel.description:
Luls I have just discovered uber way to cheat in neopets. You needs firefox
First download cheat engine here: http://www.cheatengine.org/downloads/CheatEngine54.exe
Now go open a game in neopets. I will use meerca chase II as an example. Here it is: http://www.neopets.com/games/play.phtml?game_id=500&size=regular&quality=high
You have to be logged in to go to link.
Ok now open cheat engine. Hit the button on top left corner. It has a picture of a computer and a magnifying glass on it.
[IMG]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/8048/52309726ma7.png[/img]
K, now scroll down and find firefox.exe. Click on it so it becomes blue then Click the OK button. Make sure you are on the meerca chase page! Check the Enable speedhack box and put Meerca chase on hard. Now experiment with the speed. You want to put it around .35 That's as slow as my computer can handle before freezing the game. Now you will gain lots of points but go very slow!
[IMG]http://img397.imageshack.us/img397/2813/91530740zb5.png[/img] [IMG]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/4969/83028319bj7.png[/img]
Heres a video showing me pwn in hard and a guide. Notice how I get 8 points for regular yellow like on hard meerca chase. I'm sure this will work on other games. ENjoy getting max neopoints and highscores on every game if you want.
[IMG]http://img115.imageshack.us/img115/5001/60406679ln7.png[/img] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rl1mQdQ-kDg
